IT'S A WONDERFUL LIFE

Dover 0 Yeltz 3

10 March 2003

In a fantastic and totally unexpected way, we're right back in with a chance of staying up after a stunning 3-0 victory away at Dover. Another goal from Mark Danks followed by two from Frazer (one a penalty) hasn't moved us up but we're now only in the bottom four on goal difference - which has been much-improved tonight.
